abstract: I have innocent reasons for poking around Craigslist. A friend of mine is looking for a studio apartment. I would like to find a not-too-expensive bicycle.
snippet: I have innocent reasons for poking around Craigslist. A friend of mine is looking for a studio apartment. I would like to find a not-too-expensive bicycle.
lead_paragraph: I have innocent reasons for poking around Craigslist. A friend of mine is looking for a studio apartment. I would like to find a not-too-expensive bicycle. But, once on the site, it is hard not to get pulled into all the strangeness that people in New York are selling, buying and generally proclaiming to the world. My three favorite items today:

headline.main: My Three Favorite Things on Craigslist Today
